original: intros Hlt Heq. apply lt_n_Sm_le, NPeano.Nat.lt_le_incl in Hlt. pose proof (convex_le y x) as H1. apply NPeano.Nat.le_antisymm. - replace (y * x + x * y) with (2 * (x * y)) in H1 by lia. rewrite Heq. pose proof (convex_1 y (b - a)) as H2. replace (y * y + (y + (b - a)) * (y + (b - a))) with (a * y + b * x) by lia. pose proof (convex_2 y (b - a)). destruct H as [Ha_p Hb_p]. subst. replace (2 * (y * (y + (b - a)))) with (y * y + (y + b - a) * (y + b - a)). auto. - apply convex_eq. rewrite <- Heq. symmetry. apply convex_eq. rewrite Heq. symmetry. auto.
